name: Reminant
description:
Reminant is a small indie game that is set in a mystical and fantasy-fiction world called "Tantumia". BottlecapGames developers utilize the Unity engine to design a new rogue-like action video game.

The Story:

During the Eclipse night, The Tree of Hatred commanded his minions of darkness to come to the Mystical Forest and attack the village. The evil Tree wanted to capture them to brew the spirits into magical water that can keep him alive. 

Luckily, Spooki was left behind unconscious but unharmed. He woke up to find his village burned and all of his people captured. With a determination for revenge, he knew he couldn’t beat the Tree of Hatred and his army by himself, thus Spooki travels to the Uncanny River to retrieve the Water Power. With the Water Power, He was able to access the Scorching Volcano and acquired the Fire Power. 

After obtaining the three powers, Spooki ventured North of Tantumia, into the Shadow Forest to confront the Tree of Hatred and his evil minions. The player is role-playing as “Spooki”, fighting to save his village.
